Hosting Vlocity Templates On An External Server
You can deploy OmniStudio for Vlocity components, including OmniScripts and Cards Framework components, outside of Salesforce. This type of deployment is also called off-platform. You can use these components in an external server with or without an active connection to a Salesforce org. You can deploy components to a Heroku web server or to Adobe Enterprise Manager.

Certain features require a connection. Be mindful of API usage, as every call costs an API hit to your org. Use data pack side-loading and batch calls to reduce hits.
